Package org.everit.osgi.ecm.annotation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoDetect
    Placeholder class for default value of annotation properties with "auto detect" capabilities.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConfigurationPolicy
    Options for Component.configurationPolicy() property.
    ReferenceConfigurationType
    Reference items can be configured with ReferenceConfigurationType.CLAUSEs or OSGi ReferenceConfigurationType.FILTER.
    ThreeStateBoolean
    Three state boolean that can be used in other annotations.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Activate
    The Activate annotation defines the method which is used to activate the component.
    BundleCapabilityRef
    The annotation identifies a Bundle Capability reference.
    BundleCapabilityRefs
    Allows to define multiple BundleCapabilityRef annotations for one type.
    Component
    The class is an ECM Component.
    Deactivate
    The Dectivate annotation defines the method which is used to deactivate the component.
    Icon
    An optional icon that can be set for the Component to have a nicer look on the configuration screen.
    ManualService
    List of services that are registered manually via the ComponentContext when the component is activating.
    Service
    The Service annotation defines whether and which service interfaces are provided by the component.
    ServiceRef
    Reference of an OSGi service.
    ServiceRefs
    Allows to define multiple ServiceRef annotations for one type.
    Update
    Update method is called after all setters if only dynamic attributes and references are modified.
